The 26-year-old model kept close to the 25-year-old pro basketball player as they left the Catch LA restaurant after a dinner date on Saturday night (August 27) in West Hollywood, Calif.

PHOTOS: Check out the latest pics of Kendall Jenner

For their night out, Kendall paired a black sports-bra with black leather pants while Devin wore a Method Man T-shirt over a long-sleeved shirt paired with baggy denim pants.

Maye Musk Explains Why She Sleeps in 'Garage' When Visiting Son Elon in Texas Maye Musk is opening up about spending time with son Elon Musk.

In a new profile, the 74-year-old model discussed her close bond with the 51-year-old SpaceX and Tesla CEO.

While Elon might be the richest man in the world, Maye said that her son isn’t interested in possessions “at all.”

Back in April, Elon said that he doesn’t own a home, and that he has to stay at “friends’ places.”

Maye also revealed that when she goes to visit Elon in Texas – wh Read more

“No better way to celebrate my momma than a surprise hoedown🤠” Sydney wrote along with the photos from the Western-themed party.

Earlier this year, stars including Daniel Radcliffe, Emma Watson, Rupert Grint, and many more reunited for the Harry Potter 20th Anniversary: Return to Hogwarts, which debuted on HBO Max.

She then filed for divorce, claiming Ne-Yo fathered a child with another woman.

During a recent outing, Crystal was asked if she would consider trying to work things out with Ne-Yo.

The married couple went out for lunch with Maria on Friday afternoon (August 26) in Santa Barbara, Calif.

Chris was seen taking some pizza to-go before going grocery shopping at a local Vons store while Katherine and Maria went clothes shopping at Poppy.

Princess Diana's custom Ford Escort sells at auction for more than $850,000 Princess Diana's custom 1985 Ford Escort RS Turbo Series 1 car sold at auction Saturday for more than $850,000. Ordered and specifically made for the late Princess of Wales, the black hatchback vehicle was only used for a few years until it was returned to the manufacturer with fewer than 6,800 miles on it. "The car is believed to be unique as the first and only black RS Turbo Series 1," according to the Silverstone Auction house. PRINCESS DIANA'S CUSTOM FORD ESCORT RS HOT HATCHBACK IS BEING AUC Read more

Hallmark Channel's 'Game Set Love' Was Produced By Venus Williams - Watch a Sneak Peek! Davida Williams and Richard Harmon give each other a high five on the court in this still from their new Hallmark Channel movie, Game, Set, Love.

The flick, which was executive produced by Venus Williams, also features tennis fashions from her clothing line, EleVen.

Here’s a summary of the movie: Taylor (Williams) is a former professional tennis player who retired from the sport following the passing of her mother so she could be there for her father, David and has been enjoying teaching Read more

Arcade Fire's Win Butler Accused of Sexual Misconduct - Read His Lengthy Response Win Butler, the frontman of the band Arcade Fire, has been accused of sexual misconduct by four people.The incidents all happened between 2015 to 2020 when the alleged victims were between the ages of 18 and 23 and he was between the ages of 34 and 39.Three of the women told Pitchfork that the encounters with Win were “inappropriate given the gaps in age, power dynamics, and context in which they occurred.” The fourth person, who is gender-fluid, said that they were sexually assault Read more

Chris turned 42 the next day and it appears he went out for a pre-birthday dinner!

The 27-year-old singer wore a white sheer dress while attending the wedding of fashion designer Simon Porte Jacquemus and his new husband Marco Maestri on Saturday (August 27) in Charleval, France.

title: Nikki Bella Is "Really Disappointed" in Brie for Asking Daniel Bryan to Put in a Good Word for Her at WWE: Watch!

meta_data.description: Are you joking right now?Nikki Bella is furious with Brie Bella on Wednesday's Total Divas season six finale. On the episode, Brie asks Daniel Bryan to put in a good word...
